debris.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the pieces of something that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident, explosion etc
debris.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She was hit by flying debris from the blast.
debris.translation[0].definitions[1].def: pieces of waste material, paper etc
debris.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Clean the ventilation ducts to remove dust and insect debris.
